items: Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey
comments: Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.
Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available.
Bank account and SWIFT code are verified and match the headquarters address.
Directorship data is available but requires further verification of the documents provided.
Tax documents are partially verified, pending additional reviews and renewals.
Regulatory compliance data includes status as compliant, but some regulations are still under review.
Business scope information is available but pending verification of the operation scale and employee range.
PEP screening data is available with high-risk ratings for certain individuals.
Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.
Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.
